record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 545

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, it is my understanding that H.R. 545 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for a second time.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now object to any further proceedings at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The measure will be placed on the calendar.
